Playground Transformations Across Chile

Location: Araucanía Region, Chile
Date: 3/3/2025
Application: playground

Project Overview

The Araucanía region of Chile is experiencing a playground transformation with the installation of visually stunning play spaces featuring Rosehill TPV®. These new installations showcase captivating patterns and vibrant colour combinations that have revitalised community areas while providing crucial safety surfacing.Specially formulated for superior UV stability, Rosehill TPV® is the perfect choice for Chile's varied climate, maintaining its colour vibrancy and essential softness for years after installation. This resilience ensures these playgrounds will continue to delight children and reassure parents long into the future.With our palette of 21 colours, local designers have created truly unique environments that stimulate children's imaginations and turn ordinary play spaces into extraordinary adventures.We’re pleased to see our products bringing joy to communities across Chile while providing the safety and durability that make them a sound investment for municipalities.Thanks to <a href="https://www.fullurbano.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Full urbano</a>
